name: SUMBR: Super Ultra Mega Battle Royale (Alpha)
name_original: SUMBR: Super Ultra Mega Battle Royale (Alpha)
description:
Super Ultra Mega Battle Royale

A 2-8 Player Couch Co-op, Competitive Party Game filled with chaos. Mario Kart meets Super Smash Bros. meets Jetpack Joyride meets every other game in human existence. 

Features

Race and Fight through an intergalactic 2D Battle Royale. Escaping a giant Laser Beam of Death,  evading a deadly Swarm of enemy aliens, all while shooting each other, and using your Power-Up collectables: 

  • Speed Boost
  • Active Shield
  • Extra health
  • Homing Missile

Be the first to get to Extraction safely, or be the Last One Standing. Many will go in, but only one will come out, it's a battle to the death.

This game will likely see more updates moving forward, all feedback is appreciated :) 

Thank You <3
